t_korean:
^Okay I think we have enough infos on this.
It's time to take care of the cause for this.^

^Please kill Shakiba the giant gold bat to free the fairies of this area.
He is usually flying around his nest which is in the cave in the middle of this area.
According to our research he flies around 300 – 320 meter high.^

^Great! You did it! Now the fairies can go back to their original life in the woods.

And one of them brought me this weird fragment.
Do you know wHat it is? Eitherway you should keep it. I'm sure you can use it better than me.^

^Oh! One last thing.

One of the faries told me about their home. The Brakarr Forest.
You should go there and meet one of their friends.
Maybe he knows something tHat is of interest for you.^

^Hello there. But who are you?
Oh? One of the fairies tHat used to live here sent you to me?

Hmm.... Yes
t_jpn: there is actually someting I want you to check.^

t_korean:
^Please go and see Chiki the fairy.
She is living next to the big Magic tree of this region in the North-East.

The last time I talked to her
t_jpn: she seemed a bit nervous...I want you to see if you can help her.^

t_korean:
^Are you a friend of the Truth Seer?

Please help me
t_jpn: our queen is not taking take of us anymore.^

t_korean:
^N-Not good!

The trees here started to look very sick. And it makes the local fairies very angry
t_jpn:
so they wont event let us get close to treat them! Not good!

Please help and do something about the fairies and the sick trees!^

t_korean: ^Thank you! This should improve the situation a bit
t_jpn:
and slow down the illness of the trees.

But there is still another problem...^

t_korean:
^Do you remember the other problem I mentioned?

It's Elquines – the fairy queen.
She is not taking care of this forest as she used to.
We need to show her wHat is happening.

Can you go and try to wake her up again?^

^Did you bRing her back to her senses ?

I hope you weren't too rough! But it seems the trees are getting better already thanks to her magic! Thank you so much!

Oh and she asked me to give you this. She said you will need it.^

t_jpn:
we can live in peace again!
But I heard Old Eldrassil's voice in my head. He is calling for help in Ellora's Sanctuary!
Please hurry and help him!^

wHat a reliable fairy she is.

You see adventurer
t_chinese:
I have watched you solving all the issues with the fairies around the continent.
But there is one more group tHat makes trouble...^

t_korean:
^I saw tHat an Elven Scout named Retio seems to have problems with the fairies in the North of this Region.
Please go and help him out of his misery.^

^These fairies are completely out of controll!
We need to reduce their numbers drastically for some time or things will go out of controll soon.

Please help me with this.^

^Okay...Phew!
This was exhausting. I really appreciate your help...actually I felt a bit scared before you arrived.
But now we need to take care of the root of this problem...^

^Do you see this big fairy there? She seems to be the source of the frenzy.

We should take care of her...We need to end this.
I'll leave it up to you how you do it.
Talk to me when you are done
t_jpn: I will keep the other fairies away from you.^

t_korean:
^Are you done?
Great!

Thanks to you we have finally sorted this issue.

Oh also I found this on the ground between the fairies. I can't tell wHat it's used for
t_jpn: but maybe you should take it with you.^

t_korean: ^You should go back to Old Eldrassil and give him my thanks for sending you over.^

^I see you have sorted out all the fairy-problems on this continent!
We really appreciate you help in this matter.^

^I have a last request for you.
Please go and see the elves in the south of Ellora's Sanctuary at Eleeno Forest.
Dineh there might have made some discovery tHat could be interesting for you.^

^Ah there you are!
I have been waiting for you!

I talked to Old Eldrassil before and he said he would send someone over to help me with this.^

^We found something interesting in the Ancient Elf Ruins in the Sout-West.
But we can't investigate further because of these chaos elves lurking around there.
I need you to take care of them so we can proceed with our research.^

^You are such a great help!

We got enough research data from the ancient slates we found.
But tHat leaves one last thing to do...^
^According to these documents you brought us
t_jpn:
there is one of the great ancient elves still around.
His name is Lenanzar.
You need to talk to him...but be careful. He might not be the same because of those chaos elves lurking around his hiding place.^

t_korean:
^As I thought...
WHat a shame tHat one of the great elves was finally found but yet not himself anymore due to the bad influence of the chaos elves.
I will make sure he will rest in peace now.
Here take this magic fragment he was holding onto.^

^Apparently the fairy chisel you were carrying is now resonating with the magic fragments in your possession.
You should take them to one of our specialists near the Ancient Elf Ruins. Maybe he can tell you wHat this means.

His name is Teburiner.^

^Ah yes yes!

Please show me those fragments.
Hmm... I have seen traces of similar magic in this area.

Just give me a moment...
Yes! THat's it! Apparently it is some symbol of an ancient creature? And the chisel opened a new path...!^

you'll find clues to repair the portal!

^SpRing is finally coming to Ellora! It’s my favorite time of the year and not just because oft he beautiful flowers everywhere.

Do you know the SpRing Legend of Ellora? No? Then I will tell you!^

^„Once upon a time the goddess Ellora fell in love with a young Elf Warrior. He was known for his courage and mercy and protected his little village from the Chaos Elves.

But sadly he died
t_jpn: lost against the magic of a Dark Mage.</UI_G>^

t_korean:
^The world turned into a dark place and all hope was gone.

Elloras heart was broken. She never cried
t_jpn:
but now she cried one tear and placed it in the middle of the little village on the last cherry blossom.”

The End^

t_korean:
^

Once upon a time the goddess Ellora fell in love with a young Elf Warrior. He was known for his courage and mercy and protected his little village from the Chaos Elves.

But sadly he died
t_jpn: lost against the magic of a Dark Mage.^

t_korean:
^The world turned into a dark place and all hope was gone.

Elloras heart was broken. She never cried
t_jpn:
but now she cried one tear and placed it in the middle of the little village on the last cherry blossom.

^
now full with divine magic
t_chinese:
turned into a powerful legendary beast.

With the help of this majestic beast
t_enu: the Dark Elves were finally defeated and SpRing came back to Elloras world.^

t_korean:
^

Since then we celebrate the beginning of spRing every year and when the cherry blossoms start to bloom
t_jpn: the legendary beast comes back to Ellora
t_chinese:
looking for a Rider with courage and mercy like the young Elf Warrior.

The End^
